text: Chuck is the third album by Sum 41. It was released on October 12, 2004. ==Track listing== ==Charts== Album Chart (2004) Peak position Australian Albums Chart 13 Canadian Albums Chart 2 French Albums Chart 9 Swiss Albums Chart 14 UK Album Charts 59 US Billboard 200 10 Singles Year Single Chart Position 2004 "We're All to Blame" Canadian Hot 100 8 U.S. Hot Modern Rock Tracks 10 U.S. Hot Mainstream Rock Tracks 36 "Pieces" Canadian Hot 100 2 German Singles Chart 84 U.S. Hot Modern Rock Tracks 14 U.S. Billboard Hot 100 107 2005 Some Say Canadian Hot 100 10 === Certifications === Country Certification Sales Canada 2x Platinum 200,000 Units+ Japan Gold 100,000 Units+ United States Gold 500,000 Units+ ==Chuck Acoustic EP (Tour Edition Promo)== Chuck Acoustic EP (Tour Edition Promo) is an acoustic EP released by Sum 41 in 2005 in Japan only. ===Track listing=== # "Pieces" (Acoustic) – 3:16 # "No Brains" (Acoustic) – 3:03 # "Over My Head (Better Off Dead)" (Acoustic) – 2:56 # "Some Say" (Acoustic) – 3:42 # "There's No Solution" (Acoustic) – 3:26 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2004 albums Category:Sum 41 albums
title: Chuck (album)
